rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with a lobby for visitors and wheelchair accessible ramp integrated.

rooms.name: Guest Lounge/Entertainment Zone
rooms.description: Multipurpose space featuring home theater setup, comfortable seating and sound system. Vastu principles aligned with cardinal directions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with attached spacious balcony for relaxation, ensuring wheelchair access via ramped doorway and accessible fixtures.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style bedroom featuring a private balcony designed for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with integrated balcony space for relaxation. All fixtures are accessible.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style bedroom with dedicated wheelchair-accessible features and an adjoining balcony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Additional bedroom, ensuring consistency in design elements with a balcony. Wheelchair accessible modifications applied.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Final bedroom designed for a balanced aesthetic and functional layout featuring a balcony and wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious dining room that doubles as a social area, placed in the south-west direction per Vastu guidelines for food and water.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A wheelchair-accessible main entrance door with a ramp.

openings.name: Balcony Doors
openings.description: Access doors leading to balconies from each bedroom, designed for ease of movement.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Strategically placed windows in rooms for natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
